response.overview: The twelfth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. The contributor, who was in charge of shooting the memory video to be broadcast at his friend's wedding reception, was turning the camera while commenting on the memories of the two people!! You will encounter a terrible figure. Maybe there was a sad incident in this place that the contributors didn't know ... and it will be revealed by the subsequent investigation.
response.tagline: A collection of psychic videos that everyone is sure to be scared!!
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 12
